name: Forum Capital Partners
overview:
Founded in 2001, Forum Capital Partners is a leading, independent private equity and alternative asset firm providing advisory and fundraising services to top-tier investment managers worldwide. Based in New York, Forum partners with established and emerging manager groups seeking to diversify and enhance their investor bases by raising institutional capital for buyout, growth equity, venture capital and real estate funds.

Forum provides private equity fund managers with comprehensive fund advisory and placement services. We coordinate all aspects of the marketing and fundraising efforts for our clients and pave the way for a swift, successful raise by streamlining the marketing process to minimize the time general partners spend fundraising.
